home.title: Home
home.tauri_note: Select one or more .cht files from filesystem
home.web_note: Web mode: HTML input demo only (limited path)
home.delete_warning: Are you sure you want to delete table "{table}" and all its records?
home.no_game_found_rawg: No game found on RAWG for the given name.
home.no_image_available_rawg: No image available on RAWG for this game.
home.no_game_found_thegamesdb: No game found on TheGamesDB for the given name.
home.no_image_available_thegamesdb: No image available on TheGamesDB for this game.
home.no_logo_or_boxart_thegamesdb: No logo or box art found on TheGamesDB.
home.path_error: Unable to get file path. Use dialog file selection.
home.web_mode_error: Desktop mode not active. HTML dialog cannot provide full paths.
home.files_selected: Files selected via HTML (demo only). Use Tauri for full import.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: This is the second example page, with layout similar to home.
settings.api_key_missing: API key not configured. Set it on the Settings page.

table.edit_description: Edit the column values and save to update the cheat.
table.create_description: Fill in the fields to add a new cheat.
table.delete_warning: Are you sure you want to delete this record?
table.duplicate_desc: A cheat with this description already exists.

bulk_add.title: Bulk add cheats
bulk_add.placeholder:
Paste cheats here. Support formats:
1) Labeled pairs:
desc: description
code: code...

2) Blocks: first line is desc, following lines are code, separated by blank lines.

3) Alternating lines: desc on a line, code on next line, repeated.

about.title: About
about.welcome_description: A modern application for managing cheat files (.cht) with an intuitive interface.
about.import_files_description: Click the 'Add' button on the home page to import your .cht files. The app will automatically create tables and populate them with cheat data.
about.manage_tables_description: Each .cht file becomes a table. You can view, edit, and delete records within each table.
about.create_records_description: Use the '+ Add' button in any table to create new cheat entries with custom fields and values.
about.edit_records_description: Click the 'Edit' button next to any record to modify its values and save changes.
about.export_data_description: Export your tables back to .cht format using the 'Export CHT' button for backup or sharing.
about.settings_description: Configure the app language, API services for game logos, and other preferences in the Settings page.
about.support_description: For questions or issues, please check the project repository or contact the developer.
